description: very well made but a bit too hard for me, got bored after lvl 4.

When run in fullscreen mode, it breaks dual monitor setup until PC restart. It makes second monitor dissapear, only one is visible, and image is cloned on both monitors. I play a lot of games currently and this is the first one ever I seen doing this. Something is seriously broken here.
I use Debian Testing.
Atomix-like game from 1990, a great game. Would recommend.
Copie de Molecularr. Toujours aussi simple à prendre en main, et finis par causer des dommages cérébraux permanent... Je suis ravi d'avoir trouvé ce clone. Merci les dev !
